trans-unit.source: Defines an interface that a cache uses in order to communicate cache memory usage to a host environment.
trans-unit.target: Define uma interface que um cache usa para comunicar a uso de memória cache para um ambiente de host.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager> interface is implemented by host environments such as ASP.NET, and is consumed by <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementations that must interact with the host environment to determine memory usage.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager> interface é implementada pelos ambientes de host, como ASP.NET e é consumido por <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementações devem interagir com o ambiente de host para determinar o uso de memória.

trans-unit.source: Because caches often consume significant quantities of memory, the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager> interface helps host environments manage memory usage.
trans-unit.target: Como caches geralmente consomem quantidades significativas de memória, o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager> interface o ajuda a ambientes de hospedagem gerenciar o uso de memória.

trans-unit.source: Typically, only <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementations that manage cache objects in memory would use this interface.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, apenas <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.ObjectCache> implementações que gerenciam objetos do cache em memória usaria essa interface.

trans-unit.source: Removes all references to a cache in the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Remove todas as referências a um cache no ambiente de host.

trans-unit.source: If a cache has previously registered itself with the host environment, the cache can call the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager.ReleaseCache%2A> method to release the reference.
trans-unit.target: Se um cache tiver se registrado anteriormente com o ambiente de host, o cache pode chamar o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager.ReleaseCache%2A> método para liberar a referência.

trans-unit.source: When a cache is being disposed, it should call the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager.ReleaseCache%2A> method to make sure that no reference to the cache is held on the host.
trans-unit.target: Quando um cache está sendo descartado, ele deve chamar o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager.ReleaseCache%2A> método para certificar-se de que nenhuma referência para o cache é mantida no host.

trans-unit.source: The size of the memory, in bytes, that the cache consumes.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho da memória, em bytes, que o cache consome.

trans-unit.source: Reports the size of the current cache.
trans-unit.target: Relata o tamanho do cache atual.

trans-unit.source: A well-behaved cache implementation should use the <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager.UpdateCacheSize%2A> method to periodically report the size of the cache's memory footprint to the host environment.
trans-unit.target: Uma implementação de cache com bom comportamento deve usar o <xref:System.Runtime.Caching.Hosting.IMemoryCacheManager.UpdateCacheSize%2A> método para relatar periodicamente o tamanho do espaço de memória do cache para o ambiente de host.

trans-unit.source: The cache implementation that reports the size also passes a reference to itself as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: A implementação de cache que informa o tamanho também passa uma referência a mesmo como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: This enables the host environment to perform the following tasks:
trans-unit.target: Isso permite que o ambiente de host para executar as seguintes tarefas:

trans-unit.source: Maintain a list of known object caches.
trans-unit.target: Manter uma lista dos caches do objeto conhecido.

trans-unit.source: Call the cache and request that the cache trim a percentage of cache items based on the reported size, if it is required.
trans-unit.target: Chame o cache e solicitar que o cache cortar uma porcentagem de itens de cache com base no tamanho do relatado, se necessário.
